newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss share trade closed Friday, Monday for Easter.
newsitem.headline: Swiss share trade closed Friday, Monday for Easter.

text.p: Swiss bourses were closed on Friday and Monday for the Easter holiday and will reopen on Tuesday.
The blue-chip Swiss Market Index gained 38.7 points, or 0.84 percent, to end at 4,659.2 on Thursday and the all-share Swiss Performance Index was up 27.08 points, or 0.93 percent, to 2,946.25.
Lindt & Spruengli will report its 1996 earnings early on Tuesday.
